name: Outcode
body:
# Welcome to Outcode in GitHub,
![Outcode Logo](http://www.outcode.co.uk/images/outcode/logos/LogoEmail.png)

## Who we are
Outcode Ltd is a UK based company, headquartered in London formed in November 2012 by Francisco DÃ­az. Our aims is to become a solid hub between business and the open source worlds by the mix of:
* The People and their Knowledge.
* Solutions based on Open Source
* Services.

![Outcode Hub](https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1v5bpw4ycKpUygiuxGQ7-qLtfzKIgPHDjZEnBtju8Qd0/pub?w=480&h=360)

For the last years Open Source Software has grown steadily in many areas and is offering a wide range of solutions, the idea behind Open Source has also expanded outside software, creating new types of licences uses like, Creative Commons, Open Data or Open Design for hardware, which has consolidated the Open Source basis.

Open Source offers new opportunities with a wide selection of possibilities and Outcode its a backend engine to join the parts involved.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
